terms.value: Return on Investment, calculated as (gain from investment - cost of investment) / cost of investment. For AHK projects, we target minimum 15% ROI.
Internal Rate of Return, the discount rate that makes NPV equal to zero. Used to evaluate project profitability over time.

Q-VAN (Queue-less Autonomous Vehicle Network) is our flagship mobility project featuring autonomous shuttles in Saudi Arabia. Current status: Feasibility study complete, projected IRR of 28%, moving into OEM partnership phase.

WOW MENA (Wheels on Wire) is our micro-mobility platform project for MENA markets. Focus on e-scooters and e-bikes with smart docking infrastructure. Currently in regulatory approval phase across 3 pilot cities.

EV Logistics Study is analyzing the electric vehicle logistics infrastructure opportunity in MENA. Market size identified: $2.4B. Study covers charging networks, fleet management, and last-mile delivery solutions.

MENA Horizon 2030 is our comprehensive regional market analysis document covering mobility, sustainability, and infrastructure trends through 2030. It serves as our strategic foundation for project selection and investor materials.

Our standardized project launch process: (1) Market Research & Feasibility, (2) Strategic Partnerships, (3) Pilot Program, (4) Regulatory Approval, (5) Capital Raise, (6) Commercial Launch. Each project follows this sequence with stage-gates.

terms.value: Ashraf H. Kahoush (Ash), Founder & CEO of AHKStrategies. Focused on mobility innovation in MENA markets. Background in strategic consulting and infrastructure development.
NEOM is Saudi Arabia's flagship smart city mega-project. Major opportunity for AHK's mobility solutions. Target for Q-VAN deployment and strategic partnership discussions in 2026.
